DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test accuracy Regadenoson induce maximal steady state hyperemia compare central venous infusion adenosine assess fractional flow reserve . ( adenosine consider gold standard ) investigate time interval maximum hyperemia induce centrally peripherally administer Regadenoson .
DOC.criteria: Age 1880 year Scheduled invasive measurement FFR diagnostic interventional purpose proximal mid segment coronary artery Severe aortic valve stenosis History severe COPD Syncope bradycardia ( le 50 beats/min ) Known conduction disturbance ( 2nd3rd degree heartblock , sick sinus without pacemaker long QTsyndrome ) Severe hypotension ( RR < 90 mmHg ) Patients access coronary circulation obtain femoral artery femoral access problematic Coronary anatomy suitable FFR measurement ( extremely tortuous calcify coronary vessel ) Previous coronary bypass surgery Recent ST elevation myocardial infarction ( < 5 day ) Recent nonST elevation myocardial infarction ( < 5 day ) peak CK > 1000 IU Inability provide inform consent Pregnancy Use methylxanthines ( last 12 hour ) Use Dipyridamol ( last 48 hour )
